tasks: I contributed to the design and development of new web platforms, as well as the ongoing maintenance of existing ones, serving as a Full Stack Web Developer
I utilized technologies such as Next.js, Svelte, Node.js, JavaScript, TypeScript, Oracle, and Docker to implement robust and efficient solutions.

I closely collaborated with multidisciplinary teams to translate business requirements into user-friendly and functional features. Specialized in optimizing performance, ensuring scalability, and enhancing the overall user experience.

Expanded experience in the comprehensive creation of an access control platform using QR codes. Responsible for the complete design and development, I utilized Svelte for the main interface, Angular for the main application, Node.js as the backend, and PostgreSQL as the database. I was responsible for conceptualizing and structuring the system from inception to successful deployment.
I adopted Agile methodologies for efficient and adaptable development, implementing advanced security measures and backup strategies to ensure the integrity and availability of data.
Web Development using both frontend and backend technologies. Specialized in creating new modules and maintaining existing ones using JQuery, JavaScript, PHP, and Oracle.
Skills in designing and implementing registration pages and forms. Committed to delivering robust and user-friendly solutions.
Maintenance and creation of registration forms for electoral campaigns.

PROJECTS.title: Ezsecure
PROJECTS.description: Ezsecure is a platform that provides comprehensive solutions for access control and security in condominiums. It simplifies management, enhances security, and provides an exceptional experience for residents and visitors.

PROJECTS.title: KindHealth
PROJECTS.description: KindHealth is a platform that provides a personalized insurance strategy for individuals and families to help protect them against financial risks.
